channel.title: Why dose my players, get reset when they logout?!? Somone help please!
channel.description:
Yo, yo, Can somone help me please when my players logout or Get D.C from my server they get reset like me and like it's easy for i just do ::pure or ::master, but for them they have too train all over again don't seen fair? right, so they are piss off and like i'm like omfg, this sucks and i was seeing if anyone could help me please tell me why and help me please! :)
...Mod Kay...

item.title: Why dose my players, get reset when they logout?!? Somone help please!
item.dc:creator: @mod_kay mod kay
item.description:
@mod_kay wrote:

Got Skillz? 7.6. And i got char file and backup file umm…and moreinfo file…=/
